title: *1st month FREE!* Stylish Living on SLamar
map_address: South Lamar near Del Curto drive
posting_body: This unit is available for immediate move in BUT can hold for 30 days.
It will also come with August rent FREE**
Check out this 78704 modern apartment with a Austin twist.
Boasting walkability to South Lamar and its finest restaurants with less than a 10 minute drive to downtown, it's the perfect place to land in town.

This is the one of most dog friendly community in Austin providing you with wide-open spaces to take your pets on long walks/runs and they even have on-site pet washing stations for when your little guy is done rolling around in the mud!

This community offers a impressive amount of on site amenities including complimentary fitness classes, a community vegetable and herb garden, covered bicycle racks, a landscaped pool area with outdoor grilling stations and direct access to the adjacent Del Curto Park, with playscape and wet-weather creek.
There are also 1/1s starting at $1,400 & large 1/1s starting at $1,500

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
